Package Database

Class MovieTicketConfig

Object
MovieTicketConfig
public class MovieTicketConfig extends Object
A static class for interfacing movie ticket configs

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) ArrayList<String>
    movieTicketConfigContent
    An ArrayList representing the movie ticket configs, which contains the following information Weekday price, weekend price, public holiday price, 2D movie markup, 3D movie markup, normal cinema markup, platinum cinema markup, adult price markup, senior price markup, and child price markup
    private static final String
    movieTicketConfigFilePath

    • movieTicketConfigContent

      ArrayList<String> movieTicketConfigContent
      An ArrayList representing the movie ticket configs, which contains the following information Weekday price, weekend price, public holiday price, 2D movie markup, 3D movie markup, normal cinema markup, platinum cinema markup, adult price markup, senior price markup, and child price markup
